MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CW1 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Railway View and the surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30 pm to repair 3rd party damage to one of our underground cables. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 4:00 pm. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:42 am on 15th March, 2021.
